definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: The content of radon gas and methane bacteria indicates obvious abnormity above the gas pool.
sentences.chinese: 气田上方氡气和甲烷菌的含量存在明显的异常。

sentences.english: The exploitation of natural gas and gas water in Sichuan Basin has a long history.
sentences.chinese: 四川盆地天然气和气田水开发历史悠久。

sentences.english: There exists no practical engineering instance of treating the methanol-containing waste water of gas field.
sentences.chinese: 气田含甲醇污水处理目前国内尚没有工程实例。

sentences.english: Pinghu oil and gas field is the first oil and gas field in East China Sea.
sentences.chinese: 平湖油气田是东海海域第一个投入开发的油气田。

sentences.english: Pinghu oil and gas field is the first oil and gas field in East China Sea.
sentences.chinese: 平湖油气田是东海海域第一个投入开发的油气田。

sentences.english: All of the characteristics show that the Daniudi is a typical compound gas field.
sentences.chinese: 各种的地质特征表明大牛气田为一典型的复式气田。

sentences.english: All of the characteristics show that the Daniudi is a typical compound gas field.
sentences.chinese: 各种的地质特征表明大牛气田为一典型的复式气田。

sentences.english: The development history of Jia-3 gas reservoir in Ziliujing gas field has more than 130 years.
sentences.chinese: 自流井气田嘉三气藏已有130多年的开采历史。

sentences.english: These methods are widely applied to the gas fields in South Sichuan with obvious effectiveness.
sentences.chinese: 该方法已在川南气田广泛应用，效果显著。

sentences.english: Klameli gas field is also our company's first complete gas field ever found.
sentences.chinese: 克拉马伊气田也是我们公司发现的首个全气田。

sentences.english: Klameli gas field is also our company's first complete gas field ever found.
sentences.chinese: 克拉马伊气田也是我们公司发现的首个全气田。

sentences.english: Artificial rock is absolutely necessary for exploitation research in oil - field.
sentences.chinese: 人工岩样是油气田开采研究中必不可少的用品。

sentences.english: The equipment will be used for recompression and export services at the new oil and gas field.
sentences.chinese: 这些设备将用于在新油气田的再压缩和输出服务。

sentences.english: The total numbers of oil-gas fields in a petroliferous basin are calculated by means of Weibull method.
sentences.chinese: 用维布尔分布法逼近含油气盆地中油气田的总数量。

sentences.english: Banqiao buried hill is located in the deep zone of Bannan fault block in Banqiao oil field.
sentences.chinese: 板桥古潜山位于板桥油气田板南断块深层。

sentences.english: Such technology has been applied first in offshore oil and gas development in China.
sentences.chinese: 无基盘钻井技术在我国海上油气田开发中属首次应用。

definition: to explore/to survey/to prospect (for oil etc)/prospecting
